trans-unit.source: The test %s was skipped because other tests failed or were skipped.

view.record.breadcrumb and debug.disableParentRecords are both enabled. Breadcrumbs will not be displayed correctly.

All required and optional PHP SSH2 functions are available.
PHP SSH functions are missing. Install the PHP ssh2 library.
The function "ssh2_sftp_chmod" is missing. Permissions will be set on CLI level, but will not report any error!
The function "ssh2_sftp_chmod" is available since php_ssh2 0.12. Either upgrade or ignore this message.
trans-unit.target: Die Funktion "ssh2_sftp_chmod" steht ab der Version 0.12 von php_ssh2 zu Verfügung. Upgraden Sie php_ssh2 oder ignorieren Sie diese Meldung.

trans-unit.source: All known settings for the SFTP data transfer are correct.
The SFTP file transfer requires the php setting allow_url_fopen to be enabled.

The SSH connection to the foreign host failed.
The following error was returned by the ssh connection:
The path to php seems to be wrong (option: foreign.pathToPhp).
The test returned following error message:

The foreign document root could not be validated, because the configured folder "%s" does not exist (option: foreign.rootPath).
Could not validate the foreign document root for other reasons.
The command returned following message:
UTF8 file and folder names will break the publishing process, because special UTF8 characters are detected as malicious on the CLI.
The local environment was validated successfully.
UTF8 filesystem configured for the local system, please disable this configuration in Install tool.

trans-unit.source: The foreign environment was validated successfully.
Could not call the CLI dispatcher on foreign because the backend user "_cli_lowlevel" is missing there.
The call to the dispatcher returned following error:
Could not call the CLI dispatcher on foreign because of an unexpected error.
The call to the dispatcher returned following message:
The installed versions on the local and foreign system are different.
The installed version of in2publish_core on the foreign system is not detectable.
Local version:
Foreign Version:
The configuration utility has following loading state:
UTF8 filesystem configured for the foreign system, please disable this configuration in Install tool.
The TYPO3 versions of the local and the foreign instance differ.
Local TYPO3 Version:
Foreign TYPO3 Version:
adminMode is set to "0" on the foreign system, which means anyone with an account can log in.
Since adminMode is not set to "2" it is possible for regular backend users to log in, if they have an account on foreign.
No valid sys_domain entry has been found on the foreign system.
A valid sys_domain entry has been found on the foreign system.
Affected Storages:
No missing FAL storages.
Missing FAL storages detected.
Storages missing on local:
Storages missing on foreign:
FAL storages case sensitivity checked.
Case sensitivity errors detected.
The FAL storages have identical drivers.
Following FAL Storages have different drivers.
The FAL driver on live will be changed by publishing. This might result in missing images in the frontend or data loss in worst case.
In this community version differences between FAL storages will be simply overwritten. Allowing different FAL drivers hence allowing Cross-Storage-Publishing (XSP) is an enterprise version feature.
All FAL storages have different file system targets.
The unique storage target test failed.
The unique storage target has skipped one or more storages, because they are offline.
Following Storages are offline:
Following Storages are offline only on foreign:
One or more storages on local have the same file system target as the corresponding storage on foreign.
Could not upload a testfile to a FAL storage. Please assure write and read permissions on the storages root level folder.

All adapter tests for the TATAPI component have passed
The selected values for the adapter configuration are okay
